title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Both points must be earned from the same row.

Identification (1 point) | Reasoning (1 point)

• DNA has a (negative) charge. | DNA moves toward the positive/oppositely charged pole.

OR

• DNA can be different sizes | (Different size DNA fragments) move at different rates.
